tr.th: Hints and instructions for entering expressions [show]

td.p: Note that rotations leave points on the axis of rotation unmoved. For a point [mathjaxinline](\theta , \phi )[/mathjaxinline] specified in polar coordinates on the surface of the Bloch sphere , the corresponding two-level quantum state is
Enter the state using the vertical bar | and greater-than symbol > to delineate a “ket" and enter [mathjaxinline]\omega _0[/mathjaxinline] as omega_0 as usual.
Expressions like (2*|a> + |b>)/sqrt(3) are legal input (remember to include * to denote multiplication, for coefficients in front of kets).
Standard mathematical functions may be employed, e.g. sin(x), sqrt(x), arccos(x), arctan(x), etc.
